org.switchyard.metadata

Class ServiceMetadataBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.switchyard.metadata.ServiceMetadataBuilder

  • public final class ServiceMetadataBuilder
extends Object
    Fluent builder for ServiceMetadata instances. This class can be used to create new ServiceMetadata objects or update existing instances of ServiceMetadata associated with a service or service reference.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ServiceMetadata build()
      Returns a configured ServiceMetadata instance.
      static ServiceMetadataBuilder create()
      Creates a new ServiceMetadata instance.
      static ServiceMetadataBuilder createFrom(ServiceMetadata metadata)
      A copy operation which is compatible with the fluent builder API in case changes are necessary.
      ServiceMetadataBuilder providedPolicies(List<Policy> providedPolicies)
      Specifies provided policies for service metadata.
      ServiceMetadataBuilder registrant(Registrant registrant)
      Specifies the registrant of a service or service reference associated with this metadata.
      ServiceMetadataBuilder requiredPolicies(List<Policy> requiredPolicies)
      Specifies required policies for service metadata.
      ServiceMetadataBuilder security(ServiceSecurity security)
      Specifies service security for service metadata.
      ServiceMetadataBuilder throttling(Throttling throttling)
      Specifies throttling for service references.
      static ServiceMetadataBuilder update(ServiceMetadata metadata)
      Used to update an existing instance of ServiceMetadata by chaining additional calls after the call to update().

      • throttling

        public ServiceMetadataBuilder throttling(Throttling throttling)

        Returns:

      • build

        public ServiceMetadata build()
        Returns a configured ServiceMetadata instance.
        Returns:
        ServiceMetadata

      • create

        public static ServiceMetadataBuilder create()
        Creates a new ServiceMetadata instance. This method is called first when building a new ServiceMetadata instance.
        Returns:
        a reference to this builder to configure the ServiceMetadata

      • update

        public static ServiceMetadataBuilder update(ServiceMetadata metadata)
        Used to update an existing instance of ServiceMetadata by chaining additional calls after the call to update().
        Parameters:
        metadata - the ServiceMetadata to update
        Returns:
        a reference to this builder to configure the ServiceMetadata

      • createFrom

        public static ServiceMetadataBuilder createFrom(ServiceMetadata metadata)
        A copy operation which is compatible with the fluent builder API in case changes are necessary.
        Parameters:
        metadata - the ServiceMetadata to copy
        Returns:
        a reference to this builder to configure the ServiceMetadata
